experience.title: Summer Analyst
experience.description: Assisted the Portfolios Group (part of the Distressed Products Group), a Principal Investment desk focused on buying non-performing loan portfolios secured by real estate assets across Europe & EM. Worked with the London team to perform RE due diligence and valuation of these NPL portfolios.

positions.subtitle: Business Club, IIT Kharagpur
positions.description: B-Club is IIT Kharagpur's on-campus society dedicated to all things business. We aim to familiarize our members with analytics, finance and business strategy through interactive sessions, workshops, and discussions. Our club serves as a dynamic platform connecting students, professionals, faculty and alumni to foster creative thinking and strategic development for future business leaders.
